title: Apple releases first macOS 12.4 beta
content:
After officially launching its last major release, macOS 12.3, in the middle of March with Universal Control, new emoji, and more, Apple has started up its testing cycle again. The first macOS 12.4 beta is now showing up for developers.

more…

The post Apple releases first macOS 12.4 beta appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: After officially launching its last major release, macOS 12.3, in the middle of March with Universal Control, new emoji, and more, Apple has started up its testing cycle again. The first macOS 12.4 beta is now showing up for developers. macOS 12.4 beta 1 is now available via OTA for developers already enrolled in the […]
